Description: Fragment of tapestry (single warp thread), perhaps from a ritual wall-hanging, undyed (yellowy) and blue cotton on an undyed linen warp. Design of repeating animal-headed deity seated on a chair holding a staff in right hand and with an emblem on his head. Band of plain stripes and chevrons below the design and three rows of chequers.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2003 10 Apr-31 Aug, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2003/4 23 Sep-4 Jan, Madrid, Sala de Exposiciones de la Fundacio, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
